The weird numbers at the top of Microsatellite genotype data.xlsx are essential parameters for Genalex

Microsatellite genotype data.xlsx has the original plus all the genalex analysis
Microsatellite_genepop_data.xlsx has the orginal data transformed into a more genepop friendly form, it is further converted in R
microsatellite_geno_pop.txt is the microsatellite data in genepop format
sampling_information.xlsx is the sampling info sheet from the original data
